item.title: Direct Preference Optimization Using Sparse Feature-Level Constraints
item.description: Feature-level constrained Preference Optimization (FPO) boosts LLM alignment efficiency and stability by using sparse autoencoders and feature-level constraints, achieving significant improvements ove…
